title: Fix bad canvas artboard size - hardcoded to letter format
Fix user-facing website flow - anonymous users only see register/login instead of content
Fix database connection configuration once and for all - environment variables not stable between dev/production
description: The database connection keeps having whack-a-mole issues between development and production environments. Environment variables aren't being loaded consistently.

title: Fix drag refactor that broke the color picker functionality
description: The drag performance refactor broke the color picker itself. Need to fix the drag implementation without breaking the core color sampling functionality.
